title: How to meet Justin Bieber for free in India - Quora

response.answer_text: Meeting Justin Bieber is every beliebers dream but to meet him we have to use our plenty of money's on him. That's why you can use instagram and try to convince Justin Bieber by your voice or by any inspirational speech. Or by your style anything which impresses person when ever he will just text you ask him in between about your meeting dont take it seriously it only happens with lucky persons.

It has became really difficult now, because he had come India on 2017 and it's 18. I don't know he will come back or not. You can go other countries to meet him. It's very difficult to meet him for free. People spend a lot money then get a chance to meet him.. I can understand what you want to ask because I am also a belieber. Every belieber's dream is to meet him.

If he ever comes here just for fun (as a tourist, I mean), try to get past his 20 or so bodyguards and yell at the top of your voice “Babyyyyy !” or “Justiiiin !” and try to get him to notice you . This is still risky, because he might come and meet you, but he might also have you sent out, so all the best !
